DOC.brief_title: A Lifestyle Intervention Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: Participants assign randomly one three group : 1 ) newly develop mail-based intervention ( Targeting Teachable Moment Intervention ; TTMI ) , 2 ) standard Lifestyle Intervention ( SLM ) , 3 ) usual care . Both TTMI SLM focus health behavior , however TTMI additionally address psychosocial issue specific breast cancer survivor . All participant complete questionnaire time start study , end 4 month , 3 month later follow-up . If participant assign intervention group , receive material every week 4 month . If participant assign usual care group , receive material standard lifestyle intervention et end 7 month .
